response.answer_text: If you look at the word in its parts: multi - means more than one; many, especially variegated. media -  means plural form of medium OR the main means of mass communication (especially television, radio, newspapers, and the Internet) regarded collectively. It is any form of communicating information that combine 2 or more formal media.(writing, drawing, video, sound, smell,etc). In that respect, even a birthday card with sound ( a song or words)  is a multimedia device or communication. Cheers.

Multimedia, or Multi-media is literally many mediums. Multi, meaning many or at the very least more than one. And media meaning medium, meaning the thing, or things you use. For example: Ink, clay and paint are different mediums or media, and if you can paint a picture, sculpt in clay, and do calligraphy with ink, you are able to work in or on Multi-media. In today's world this term generally is associated with the many digital media technologies and design and development skills needed to work across all those platforms. A multi-media designer should therefore be able to work across many disciplines of design and media.
